oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Wartime newspaper printed in Cleveland, Tennessee
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: When the Federal army took posession of Cleveland, Tennessee in November 1863, the soldiers seized the printing press of the Cleveland Banner and briefly published an army newspaper "The Battle-Flag." This edition is dated March 30, 1864. The newspaper; includes articles about the war, poems, and advertisements selling military goods.
